abstract.t: This memo discusses use of RTP in the context of the RTC-Web activity. It discusses important features of RTP that need to be considered by other parts of the RTC-Web framework, describes which RTP profile to use in this environment, and outlines what RTP extensions should be supported. This document is a candidate to become a work item of the RTCWEB working group as <WORKING GROUP DRAFT "MEDIA TRANSPORTS">.
